intro: Ostodes paniculata, commonly known as the panicled ostodes, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Meliaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its compound leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant produces small, elongated fruits that contain several seeds. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along stream banks. Its botanical features make it an important component of its native ecosystems.
